Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply. I was gettig so desperate, side effects better at moment but agonising piles. Anyone know any effective remedies. Its my 2nd chemo and dreading the next one. Taxotere and herceptin 4th cycle so very apprehensive. Mental struggle as well as physical. Love to hear from anyone to share a awful experience thats soul destroying.
Posts.Title: Feel crap!

Posts.Content: on FEC regimen and suffering hellish side effects. Bleeding agonizing piles .  Any ideas howto help! constant watering in mouth!need to eat and feel shit. Mood swings horrendous and very angry ,emotional and down! anyone else out there feel so crap! clarebare x
Posts.Title: Feel crap!
